mapper.select:
select
from deposit_currency_order_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} for update

select
from deposit_currency_order_user where uid = #{uid} order by create_date desc
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(money),0.00) as limitByToday from deposit_currency_order_user where DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y%c%d") = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),"%Y%c%d") and uid = #{uid}

SELECT COALESCE(count(money),0) as num from deposit_currency_order_user where status in ('WAIT','PROCESSING') and DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d%H') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H')-12 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
mapper.update: update deposit_currency_order_user set status = 'CANCEL' where status in ('WAIT','PROCESSING') and DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y%m%d%H') < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H')-12 ORDER BY update_date DESC;
mapper.select:
select
from deposit_currency_order_user
status = 'WAIT' and update_date < date_sub(now(),interval 3 DAY) order by update_date asc limit 30
